 Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. Revised to align format of hypotheses to common style.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2016.)  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 13-May-2018.)
statement:
cbv2.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
cbv2.2 $e |- F/ y ph $.
cbv2.3 $e |- ( ph -> F/ y ps ) $.
cbv2.4 $e |- ( ph -> F/ x ch ) $.
cbv2.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
cbv2 $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x ps <-> A. y ch ) ) $.
